import { Typography,Paper,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableRow,TableContainer,Button } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const BooksTable = ({rows, selectedBook, deleteBook}) => { // Sort the rows by 'id' in ascending order const sortedRows = [...rows].sort((a, b) => a.id - b.id); return( Book Table Book ID Book Name Author { rows.length>0? rows.map(row=>( {row.id} {row.name} {row.author} )):( No Data ) }
) } export default BooksTable
